committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to validate conveyances of certain lands in the State of California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company.
short_title: Railroad Right of Way Conveyance Validation Act of 1985

summary.text: Railroad Right-of-Way Conveyance Validation Act of 1985 - Validates the conveyance of specified lands in San Joaquin County, Sacramento County, Kings County, and Nevada County, California, which form parts of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company. Maintains the width of the right-of-way. Reserves to the United States mineral rights in such lands.

titles.title: Railroad Right of Way Conveyance Validation Act of 1985
A bill to validate conveyances of certain lands in the State of California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company.
